channel.title: Thoughts on Software and puns
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Software and puns

item.title: Life recently
item.description: Recently busy with many aspects of life: playing dinosaur with my nephew, suddenly having to look for a new flat, annoying admin things that involve people that ask for a lot of money for the right to chat to them.

item.title: Talebian software development
item.description: Having read Nicholas Nassim Taleb, I noticed 2 ideas of his overlaping with software development practices.
